Application.Name: Microsoft Windows Media Player Setup Utility

Item.Name: Microsoft Windows Media Player Setup Utility

Setting.Name: Office 2016 / 365 - Online Services Cache
Setting.Description: Custom Setting for Office 2016 / 365 - Services Manager Cache & DocTold Mapping
Setting.CustomItem: <Configuration xmlns="http://schemas.appsense.com/em/desktopsettings3"><Personalization><UserSettings><Setting Name="Office 2016 / 365 - Online Services Cache" Description="Custom Setting for Office 2016 / 365 - Services Manager Cache & DocTold Mapping"><SettingItemRef RefID="ItemRefOffice2016/365-OnlineServicesCacheReg" /></Setting></UserSettings><SettingItems><SettingItem Name="ItemRefOffice2016/365-OnlineServicesCacheReg" Handler="RegistrySettingHandler"><OSFilters><OSFilter Operator="GreaterThanOrEqualTo" OS="XP"><RegistryKey Path="HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Office\16.0\Common\ServicesManagerCache" /><RegistryKey Path="HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Office\16.0\Common\Identity\DocToIdMapping" /></OSFilter></OSFilters></SettingItem></SettingItems></Personalization></Configuration>

Setting.Name: Office 2016 MAPI Profile
Setting.Description: Custom settings for MS Office 2016 MAPI registry path
Setting.CustomItem: <Configuration xmlns="http://schemas.appsense.com/em/desktopsettings3"><Personalization><UserSettings><Setting Name="Office 2016 MAPI Profile" Description="Custom settings for MS Office 2016 MAPI registry path"><SettingItemRef RefID="ItemRefOffice2016MAPIProfileReg" /></Setting></UserSettings><SettingItems><SettingItem Name="ItemRefOffice2016MAPIProfileReg" Handler="RegistrySettingHandler"><OSFilters><OSFilter Operator="GreaterThanOrEqualTo" OS="XP"><RegistryKey Path="HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Office\16.0\Outlook\Profiles\" /><RegistryValue Path="HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Office\16.0\Outlook\DefaultProfile" /></OSFilter></OSFilters></SettingItem></SettingItems></Personalization></Configuration>

Setting.Name: Office 2016/365 Identity and Registration
Setting.Description: Settings to personalize Office 2016/365 Identity & Registration
Setting.CustomItem: <Configuration xmlns="http://schemas.appsense.com/em/desktopsettings3"><Personalization><UserSettings><Setting Name="Office 2016/365 Identity and Registration" Description="Settings to personalize Office 2016/365 Identity & Registration" ><SettingItemRef RefID="ItemRefOffice2016/365IdentityandRegistrationFile" /><SettingItemRef RefID="ItemRefOffice2016/365IdentityandRegistrationReg" /></Setting></UserSettings><SettingItems><SettingItem Name="ItemRefOffice2016/365IdentityandRegistrationFile" Handler="FileSettingHandler"><OSFilters><OSFilter Operator="GreaterThanOrEqualTo" OS="XP"><Folder Path="{CSIDL_LOCAL_APPDATA}\Microsoft\Office\16.0\Licensing\" /></OSFilter></OSFilters></SettingItem><SettingItem Name="ItemRefOffice2016/365IdentityandRegistrationReg" Handler="RegistrySettingHandler"><OSFilters><OSFilter Operator="GreaterThanOrEqualTo" OS="XP"><RegistryKey Path="HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Office\16.0\Common\Identity" /><RegistryKey Path="HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Office\16.0\Common\General" /><RegistryKey Path="HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Office\16.0\Registration" /><RegistryKey Path="HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Office\16.0\Common\Licensing" /><Folder Path="%localappdata%\Microsoft\Office\16.0\Licensing\" /></OSFilter></OSFilters></SettingItem></SettingItems></Personalization></Configuration>

Setting.Name: Office 2013 / 365 - Online Services Cache
Setting.Description: Custom Setting for Office 2013 / 365 - Services Manager Cache & DocTold Mapping
Setting.CustomItem: <Configuration xmlns="http://schemas.appsense.com/em/desktopsettings3"><Personalization><UserSettings><Setting Name="Office 2013 / 365 - Online Services Cache" Description="Custom Setting for Office 2013 / 365 - Services Manager Cache & DocTold Mapping"><SettingItemRef RefID="ItemRefOffice2013/365-OnlineServicesCacheReg" /></Setting></UserSettings><SettingItems><SettingItem Name="ItemRefOffice2013/365-OnlineServicesCacheReg" Handler="RegistrySettingHandler"><OSFilters><OSFilter Operator="GreaterThanOrEqualTo" OS="XP"><RegistryKey Path="HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Office\15.0\Common\ServicesManagerCache" /><RegistryKey Path="HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Office\15.0\Common\Identity\DocToIdMapping" /></OSFilter></OSFilters></SettingItem></SettingItems></Personalization></Configuration>

Group.Description: Settings required to support Mail profiles and signatures
Settings to persist Office 2016/365 Identity and Registration. In order to roam Office 365 licenses you must also assign the Security WSG to your Personalization group.
Settings for Office 2016 / 365 Online Services Cache
Settings for MS Office 2013 / 365 Online Services
